features: Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL
Dimensions: 16.75" x 6.5" x 17" (42.5 cm x 16.5 cm x 43.2 cm)
body: 60 g/m² woven Cordura® nylon ripstop with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish
pockets: 80 g/m² nylon, elastane with FlashDry™
Water bottles retract quickly with a simple leash system
Layered pocketing with secure-zip pocket for streamlined organization
Large back pocket fits jackets and other large items and closes easily without having to take off the pack
Pocket above back hem fits trekking poles to secure them while you’re running
Minimalist whistle included for security and to meet race regulations
